api_list.name: Validate OTP
api_list.description: Validate your OTP and get Verification Details, including all user INFO
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pan-card-otp-verification.p.rapidapi.com/iec/guestservicesapi/validateOTP/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pan-card-otp-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
